name: Dev Vora
review: The Paneer Tikka Masala exudes a tantalizing blend of smoky flavors and velvety textures, a true symphony of spices.

name: Elon Musk
review: Savoring the fragrant Basmati Rice paired with the aromatic Dal Makhani transports one to the heart of Punjab's culinary heritage.

name: Bill Gates
review: Indulge in the decadent richness of the Butter Naan, its pillowy softness complementing the robust flavors of North Indian curries.

name: Brad Pitt
review: The delicate balance of tangy tamarind and aromatic spices in the Chole Bhature offers a delightful culinary journey through the streets of Delhi.
